website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive version of a classic lamp.
pros: Amber hue from the plastic shade imitates the look of mica
Goes well with all kinds of décor
cons: High-wattage bulbs could damage the shade

customer_reviews.title: CAN START A FIRE UNLESS YOU DO THIS:
customer_reviews.text: IT ALMOST STARTED A FIRE IN MY OFFICE!!! Do this to make yours safer: There's a flat plastic piece just below the bulb, meant to diffuse the light, and if it gets too hot, it will burn. REMOVE THIS PIECE and throw it away to avoid that happening. The lamp is fine without it. Otherwise if it gets hot enough as mine did, the plastic will char and do a slow burn, and either start a fire or - if you're lucky - slowly burn out and just make a mess. (I reported this to Amazon but they are still selling it.)
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: This appeared to be a good lamp until the plastic insert inside the shade melted. I checked the bulb and it is the correct wattage and type. Buyer beware. Could start a fire.
customer_reviews.author: johnnynova

customer_reviews.title: Crooked and 'mica' is not a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was weird. Styrofoam was of lowest quality. Brittle and impossible to avoid making a terrible mess.. I ordered 2 lamps. They are both crooked and the 'mica' colored film does not fit perfectly, so you see white light coming from the corners. The base and uprights are sturdy and straight. The horizontal armatures are not square. I tried to 'muscle' them to square, but no luck. I had 2 similar lamps, obviously made by someone else and they were perfect. Not a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: 2x6spds

customer_reviews.title: Shade is dangerous and deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking lamp but buyer beware. The so called mica reddish amber lining is some type of conglomerated plastic that catches fire easily when it gets too hot. To eliminate this problem because I really like the look of the lamp, I gutted half of the shade near the back to allow for more lamp breathability, problem solved. But shouldn't the manufacturer know better to begin with. If you buy this, be prepared to make some safety modifications and you'll still have a nice lamp. I guess you get what you pay for. Maybe they should lower the price for this cheap shade material.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlightlady339

customer_reviews.title: A perfect lamp for my desk.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the negative reviews I was reluctant to rider this lamp but for the price how bad could it be? I received mine today and it was in perfect condition. All of the pieces were assemblyed perfectly. I used a 60w equivelaht 4.5w led long frosted bulb. The light is perfect for my desk as well as the color of the shade. I could not be more delighted with my purchase. However, using an incedenceht bulb is folly ... go led. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: S. Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Crooked lampshade weld
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the other reviews. I got the impression this purchase was iffy. Lamp arrived after THREE months. set it p and the rod that connects shade to base was welded so the lamp shade was very noticeably crooked, *very* crooked. I sent it back, no problem in return, that part went smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: It has an antique looks so I'm good.....
customer_reviews.text: The lamp adds a nice effect when used opposite my green Banker’s Lamp on the right side on my desk so it serves its purpose. It came very well packaged and is much heavier than expected. It’s not perfectly balanced but not noticeable unless you are looking for it. It does has a flaw in the front of the plastic shade that is more noticeable when the lamp is turned off. It seems this type of flaw is common with plastic shades. The shade is starting to slightly discolor from the Sylvania 13W 120v 60Hz bulb but a cold t bulb is $10 so I'll wait,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 60-watt bulb will scorch the shade
customer_reviews.text: Cute, inexpensive, and we liked the amber light. We purchased the suggested 60 watt bulbs to go with it. Today we noticed a blackened spot on the shade, upturned it and saw the shade was scorched. This is not a mica shade; it is plastic. I think it would be a fire hazard if you are running the light more than half an hour, so I am returning it and looking for lamp with a glass shade.
customer_reviews.author: MacJac

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with scratches on light, terrible packaging, but otherwise a beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty but the light cover has a very noticeable scratch on it. The packaging foam created an utter mess, it consisted of the worst, messy styrofoam I haver seen and the styrofoam was taped together with packing tape making the mess even worse. My floor was covered in pieces of foam, and it clung to my hands and pants. Our office assistant didn't even want to touch it. If you buy this, spread out some plastic wrap on the floor first, because you're going to have a mess on your hands. I am very disappointed with the scratch but other than that it's a beautiful light.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tipling

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking lamp and it sturdy and heavy. Two cons: (1) The light socket is very cheap and chain does not pull smoothly. Pulling the chain will pull the lamp over if you do not anticipate it. (2) The shade is a plastic material that is not heat resistant. If you use a regular bulb to provide more light, it will melt the shade and sag. This is very unsightly and potentially dangerous. So make sure you use a 60 watt T10 bulb. I wish the shade was glass.
customer_reviews.author: telemachus

customer_reviews.title: I love the style
customer_reviews.text: I love the style, but we had to straighten it out, as the shade was sitting slightly crooked. Do NOT use their recommended bulbs, as they are way too hot and melted the shade badly.. I love the style, but had change to 20 watt clear LDL so it would be cool enough. It's nice for the price for a cheap imitation of a grand old style. If I had it to do again, I'd spend a bit more on something built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I was lucky but this item arrived without the glue and other issues some have encountered. I agree with reviewers who rate the product highly. It's very attractive, sturdy, and looks like a quality piece. The hood when not lit is a brown/bronze color. The light bulbs could be a drawback, and I wound up buying several online as one reviewer recommended, since I'm not going to drive all over in search of a specialized bulb. I would not use this lamp as my primary office working lighting, but for decorative and occasional use, it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Fabulous FinnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Chinese junk - don't bother!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the LAST time I will trust Amazon for home furnishings! Cheap, deceptive, poorly-made junk, made in China (of course!); all vinyl & pot metal & low-grade lead paint, crookedly assembled, just total gee-gaw junk, not at ALL the way it was advertised online. I'd make them take it back, but that means financing shipping back to China, and waiting another 7 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Cass wright

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!! False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!! False advertising! Doesn’t even include the extremely specific light bulb and didn’t mention that anywhere in the description
customer_reviews.author: sean santos

customer_reviews.title: with some tweaking i can make it look good.
customer_reviews.text: i didnt pay close enough attention when i bought it. the image they provide has the lamp being on and i wanted the lamp to look like that while it was off. it is much darker when turned off and looks ugly. The paint is really dull looking too. The light also favors one side because my might bulb isnt in the middle. it works really good though and seems well made overall. the pulley has the perfect amount of pressure required for it to light up for my tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Galvanicsolutions

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY: Fire Hazard!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this in I was very pleased. It is a beautiful lamp. After a few days, however, the lamp shade began to warp. My husband took a closer look and the inside of the lamp shade (which is made of paper) was starting to burn--despite the fact that we used the correct lightbulb. This lamp is a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: G.M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price but cheaply made. The shade is paper or cardboard type material. It’s a little unbalanced when pulling chain due to light weight. Looks good and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Previously returned/defective item
customer_reviews.text: Product description says - item:new. When I opened shipping carton the original boxing was previously opened/re-packaged and returned because it was defective. How can you give a "star" rating to something that doesn't work? Hope anyone that orders this lamp doesn't get the same one I and others had been shipped. Can't figure out why this light would be used to fill to someone's order after being returned before being checked and repaired. Notice should be provided that it is an "open box" sale item.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This lamp arrived in excellent shape, and looks beautiful. I had no problem finding the proper bulb at my local hardware store. We put it on top of Amazon's Winsome wood walnut secretary desk , and it really compliments the desk, as well as being functional. My husband says it looks simple, yet elegant. I think that it looks very similar to much more expensive banker's lamps. It's attractive when unlit, and gives a nice, warm glow when lit. We've only been using it for a couple of weeks, so only time will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Marian R.

customer_reviews.title: Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Dec4 th and just received it March 10th but was worth waiting on .. looks great ! Very well made
customer_reviews.author: Peggy  W Thomason

customer_reviews.title: The red mica cover is in fact just a plastic sheet and the overall quality of the workmanship is pretty low. If you notice thing
customer_reviews.text: We had to return two of these and finally decided not to get one. The red mica cover is in fact just a plastic sheet and the overall quality of the workmanship is pretty low. If you notice things like that, it makes more sense either to get something that does not pretend to be fancy or to shell out $150 or more to get something that really is fancy. On the other hand, if you don't look closely at such things, this may do. The cover does look pretty when the light is on.

customer_reviews.title: 60 & 40 WATT BULBS ARE TOO HOT FOR THIS SHADE
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION : This lamp will warp with a 60 watt and 40 watt bulb. I don't know how they can say to use a 60 watt bulb. The plastic shade became extremely hot to the touch and warped within 15 min. A 40 watt is too hot too. I put in a 25 watt and it was perfect. The lamp itself is handsome and well made for the price. I can only recommend a 25 watt bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Weiler

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Plastic 'shade' ruins what could be a decent lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a 'mica shade' - it is a cheap plastic "shade" printed with a poor representation of a Mica shade. The bulb recommended with this lamp, a 60-watt frosted will soon burn a discoloration into this cheap, shoddy shade. DO NOT BUY THIS. It is really, really poor. Looks good in the pic, but the shade is dreadful.
customer_reviews.author: KEN

customer_reviews.title: affordable and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is heavy and a good replica of the real banker's lamp but not super high quality. The "glass" is really plastic but It looks very nice on our antique roll top desk and serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp itself is a nice design, sturdy and very bright with 60 watt t-bulb. Recommend using only 40 watt t-bulb which seems more than adequate and efficient. The downside to this lamp is the shade, a very cheap plastic print shade with minute scratches and even dark ink blotches to the print. At close-up defects are easily noticeable but at a distance some are not seen. For $40 you think they could easily remedy this with a better quality shade and thus have an excellent lamp which I would have gladly given a 5 star rating instead of 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: These lamps were a big disappointment. They look stunning
customer_reviews.text: These lamps were a big disappointment. They look stunning, but the shades are quite flimsy and cheap-looking from up close. The metal frames for the lamps (I bought 4 of them for my library) were noticeably bent on all but 1. Next time, I'll spend a bit more money and get the traditional glass shades. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the money!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews and deciding to take the plunge, I decided to order this banker's lamp. Upon receipt of the item, we were very pleased with the shipping and packaging, and the overall quality of the lamp is better than anticipated. Very sturdy base, and nice top shade. Good light source with a 40 watt bulb. Overall, we are very pleased with the quality and worth of this lamp and I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: James Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Love this stylish, period-looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. The shade is not real mica, as they seem to indicate in the description - it is more like a heavy plastic/paper weight shade, but it looks great, and with a tube-style bulb (available at any hardware store) it doesn't get too hot. Nice, warm amber color. Base is nice and heavy and won't tip over. Goes great with antiques or contemporary décor, and I have a mix of both in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: MarthaP

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp for the money. If you want a lamp that looks like a piece of art you're gonna have to spend more than $40. I used a 40 watt bulb to prevent any melting of the plastic "mica" cover, like some had complained about. Would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: samhain

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp but does get hot.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty lamp and looks great on piano. We also purchased the 60w tube light bulb and it does make the shade hot. We have not left the lamp on for more than practice sessions. I do not think I feel comfortable leaving it on for extended times. For us, it is not a huge deal because we only bought it for piano playing. I will probably get a 40w bulb and see if it makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: c and b's mom

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks super classy and gives good light for my study area. It works perfectly with my cherry finish desk/trim/bed. It his heavily weighted so that it does not move when the cord is pulled and lets off a soft light through the mica shade while providing a focused light for reading on my table surface. I wouldn't let my laptop get too close to it though as it lets off a pretty good amount of heat. Anyone seen lED bulbs to replace t10s?
customer_reviews.author: Idontknownotin

customer_reviews.title: Meh....it lights my desk
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price so no complaint but very basic construction and quality. Instead of feeling like a got a good deal, I got what I paid for....an inexpensive "plasticy" lamp that lights my desk. If I were in a store and saw this physically, I know I wouldn't have purchased it - on line it looks better than in person.
customer_reviews.author: Nicks

customer_reviews.title: Just Great I love it !
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, the two came on serrate orders and are slightly different but never the less are great, Its made of metal and a beautiful chocolate brown velour topped with a nice red orange cover. Feels like its built to last. I added an T10 LED bright light in my two and illuminates wonderfully. A timeless Classic !
customer_reviews.author: mark richard smith-manley

customer_reviews.title: Good For The Price
customer_reviews.text: We read the reviews and decided to give this lamp a try. We've been looking for lighting fixtures and really high quality ones cost a bundle. This is a sturdy lamp for the price. The base is heavy enough so it doesn't tip over when pulling the chain. The fake mica looks fine when illuminated. This is a darn good lamp for under $50. The bulbs can be had on Amazon. I've also used florescent bulbs instead of the T10. Read the reviews, know what you're getting, and I think you'll like what comes in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: N. Zorn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this pretty task lamp. If there was any question, the shade is plastic, but I assure you: you won't care because it doesn't matter. The lamp is so very pretty when lit! The base is nicely-weighted to prevent tipping. Easy on/off with the pull chain. The shade tilts up/down but does not swivel left/right. Uses 1 T10-type bulb, which isn't included, but is about $5 here on Amazon. (T10 bulbs are those long, cylindrical bulbs.) We ordered the lamp on Tuesday, and it arrived on Thursday. It was securely packed and safely handled. Very easy to unpack. No assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp and really adds a touch of style to my office! Only gave 4 stars because I think they should have included a bulb. No one likes to open a box for something new to play with and have to run to the store first! For those that received a lamp with issues, everything is made in China, so there are bound to be defects! Ship it back and try again! Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking lamp. Solid build. Except for plastic lamp shade. Get vintage color LED style bulb for better ambiance.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp base is sturdy and the build is very solid. It's a classy looking lamp. However, the lampshade is cheap plastic. It accomplishes the overall effect but glass would've been far nicer. With that being said, unless someone touches the plastic, they'll never know. Also, I highly recommend getting vintage colored LED style bulbs with an orange glow. White LED bulbs are too bright and ruin the lamps effect. You can get these vintage style LED bulbs at home depot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Knock Off Lamp - Not Good!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Knock Off Lamp - Not Good! Thin plastic lamp shade, it could not possibly be made cheaper. It will not withstand the heat from a light bulb. Very sorry that I purchased this item. Live and learn, I guess. Should have read more carefully the item description and then searched for a "REAL LAMP" made of glass. Don't you hate it when you get ripped off real bad?!!
customer_reviews.author: John Brown

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this was going to be as nice a lamp as it was after reading some of the other reviews. It was a bit much for my price range for this particular purchase, but my wife really likes it, so that is obviously worth going just a bit over budget. Well made, looks good, and works. Lots of space in the bulb area to put a variety of bulbs ( I put a CFL in, works super great ) if you are into that kind of thing. Makes great ambient light in our great room on my antique desk.
customer_reviews.author: R. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: A dependable room heater.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is said to have a mica shade. I do not believe it is truly mica. I have seen and handled raw mica as well as mica in many other forms including isinglass which was used for car windows early in the last century. The material purported to be "mica" is more like colored and pattered heavy gauge plastic. Additionally, upon unpacking, the ball on the pull chain was found rolling around in the shade detached from the chain. Using the recommended, and purchased along with, bulb the lamp becomes a dependable room heater!
customer_reviews.author: Informed Consumer

customer_reviews.title: This is fine from 10 feet away
customer_reviews.text: All I wanted was a halfway decent looking desk lamp. This is fine from 10 feet away, but upon a closer inspection you realize that it is just painted pot metal making believe it is a bronze finish. The worst part is the fact that the poor quality plastic liner in the shade has turned brown (burnt) and bubbled after just a few hours of use with a 40W bulb. Likewise the plastic, make-believe mica has also warped. This lamp is simply cheap junk that looks okay from a distance but does not perform well or hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for piano!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured. We had no problem with the shade and we've left it on for ours at a time. It sits on top of our piano and provides the perfect amount of light. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique Bankers Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lighting for my piano, matches perfect with my furniture and decor in my living room. Love the color and antique look
customer_reviews.author: MissDecember

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Lamp for Larger Sized Desks
customer_reviews.text: Pretty lamp. The base is a little larger that I was expecting, but works on my large executive desk (I was going to use it on a smaller letter desk in another room but decided it was too big for that one, so choose carefully for your size and style of desk). The plastic shade works really well with some formal brown leather chairs I have nearby.
customer_reviews.author: DiMit

customer_reviews.title: Reallybnice lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this lamp. It came in perfect condition. I think it is really nice; just what I wanted. I ordered a bulb for it at the same time and it was made to order for this lamp. I highly recommend to anyone looking for a banker' s style lamp. I can't believe there are those who got it and didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: mariailly

customer_reviews.title: ELEGANT.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp far exceeded my expectations. For the price, it's beautiful and looks very elegant on my desk. It casts a beautiful glow, and creates a mood in the room. It's very warm and is one of my favorite purchases this year. Great investment. I recommend it to anyone who wants to add elegance to their home office.
customer_reviews.author: Dysartmanach

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is very pretty when lit up
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and heavy. People had experienced the inner shade burning due to excessive bulb heat. I remedied this by buying some Bonlux tubular LED lights and they worked just perfectly, The lamp is very pretty when lit up.
customer_reviews.author: Natural G

customer_reviews.title: Better than it looks in the photo
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to the negative reviews. This really is a nice lamp - especially for the low price. Fit and finish are very good. The Mica shade is beautiful and casts a warm glow in the room. Perfect size too. No, it doesn't come with a bulb, but it does say that in the description. I bought a 40 w clear T-bulb at Lowes for 3 bucks, makes a great reading light beside the couch.
customer_reviews.author: SemiColin

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This looks great on my desk and everything about it is fine. The only problem was that I tried a regular bulb in it, and that scorched the piece of plastic that simulates the mica. That was my fault. Fortunately, I caught it in time, so it was only a little scorched. If you use the special, narrow bulbs that it calls for, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp, but use LED or CFL bulb
customer_reviews.text: As a few of the reviews say, the shade is plastic. If you put in a hot incandescent bulb, it will darken or burn. So, don't even try it. Start with LED (preferred) or CFL. Other than that I think it's a great lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A Small

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, I would recommend using a low wattage ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp, I would recommend using a low wattage bulb so it doesn't get too hot. I leave it on all the time with no heat issues. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thornton

customer_reviews.title: So the answer is these are great desk lamps
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased one a long time ago when my husband decided to purchase another one. So the answer is these are great desk lamps. I like the lighting. Note to intense but yet enough light to work under.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely little lamp. I am using it on my desk at work, it adds enough light to make it a little easier to read what I'm working on, but it doesn't have a huge footprint or a large shade. I'm very pleased, and also have gotten several comments on what a nice-looking lamp it is. It doesn't look cheap at all. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the price - but be careful with the bulb you use
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely desk lamp, just as pictured. A great buy. The manufacturer states you can use a 60W bulb, but that makes the faux tortoise shell/mica shade very hot. Also - don't believe the reviews that claim the bulb is difficult to find. I paid a high price for the bulbs offered on Amazon and then found them in every hardware store I visited at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Braunsky

customer_reviews.title: We bought 2 of these lights this year with recommended bulbs. The bulbs have burned the top of ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these lights this year with recommended bulbs. The bulbs have burned the top of the light ruining it. Would not buy again and not able to reach manufacturer to report this problem. Could be very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp looks nice and works well, but it is not as well-made as I had hoped. When examined closely, you can see that it is not very well-made. For example, the shade is not fully attached to the structure (there is a slight gap). You can't see it from far away, but if you look closely, you will see the gap. It wasn't a big enough issue for me to return the lamp, and I'm happy enough with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Malek

customer_reviews.title: Right lamp, wrong advice
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp which is replacing two previously expensive lamps. It is easy to use, to turn on and requires a simple bulb. It also looks very nice. The problem is, the online copy with the lamp recommended plain 60 watt light bulbs, (which I have still not received) so I ordered them. However, when the lamp arrived, the instructions specified an E27 60 Watt type T light bulb. Somebody did not check the requirements. It's no biggy, but is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Came in 2 days without hassles. The shade and look are purposely flawed which works for my room which I'm redoing in WWI-era-doughboy and very masculine. Nice accent for my desk. Unless you're authenticating a look, this lamp may not be for you. The shade is larger than I expected, but no problem there. It's nice accent piece for the price. Parker, Atlanta
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: 60 watt bulbs melt the shade.
customer_reviews.text: I put a 60 watt bulb in, and it melted the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Spicyweiner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a piano lamp, the height is perfect for this use. I wasnt expecting much for this price, but it is a really nice, heavy duty lamp that looks and feels much more expensive then its small price tag reflects. It lets off alot of light and the shade is adjustable. The base has a nice amount of weight to it which should keep it from tipping over when you pull the chain. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi510

customer_reviews.title: This is a very solid lamp but the shade is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid lamp but the shade is plastic. It will melt with a regular bulb so you need to use an LED bulb that doesn't produce much heat.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: The Plastic Inner Shade MELTS - don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks great BUT the inner reflective screen MELTS after a few weeks of casual use. I bought one, returned it, and the same thing happened!!! I'll go to ebay and see if I find glass shade
customer_reviews.author: William B. Ponsot

customer_reviews.title: Best with and old timey LED bulb that resembles an ...
customer_reviews.text: Best with and old timey LED bulb that resembles an Edison bulb. Makes for a nice warm glow that lights the entire room. Especially good with LED flame bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Juston R. Decristofaro

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful heavy nice lamp. But the lamp shade part itself was mounted a bit crooked and it cannot be shifted back. It isn't worth the trouble to return it but it's annoying to me every time I look at it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Lee

customer_reviews.title: This lamp seems to look nice, but it is very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This lamp seems to look nice, but it is very cheaply made. The shade is not glass, and is weird. It is light weight, the bottom of the lamp has nothing to protect the metal from the desk. It was not very expensive, so I guess you get what you pay for. It does look exactly like the picture, but is very poor quality in person.
customer_reviews.author: bearly6004

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of this light, it's nice and warm even with a 60w bulb. It's much larger than I thought, the depth (front of the shade to the back of the base) is deceptive in this picture and is roughly 12 inches. looks taller than it is wide in the pic, and it definitely isn't. Overall I think it's well worth the price - I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisJ

customer_reviews.title: very happy customer,thanks to GOD.
customer_reviews.text: Before i place an order i always take time to read the reviews, I'm very happy that I guided myself towards the satisfied customers, this lamp not only looks better than the picture, but it looks expensive also, it goes beautiful with my daughter's Victorian decor, i will definitely recommend this lamp to anyone who wants something expensive looking without the expensive price.
customer_reviews.author: Angeles Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I read the product reviews prior to ordering this lamp and after considering the pros and cons, decided to go for it. The item arrived promptly and in good shape. There was no glue markings or scratches on the plastic cover and the pull chain is smooth and functional. So far, it is working great and looks beautiful on my big wooden desk.
customer_reviews.author: Becky F.

customer_reviews.title: You’ll like like it
customer_reviews.text: Just was I was looking for works great I like the weight, it’s built good
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE this lamp is a FIRE HAZARD. In less than 20 minutes of having the lamp on with the bulb suggested to use it it....the lamp shad became so HOT that it was MELTING. I literally caught it right before it caught fire. Had I had been in another room, this story would have ended much differently with my HOUSE on FIRE. Please don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: TheGambler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This lamp exceeded our expectations. As other reviewers have stated it looks as good as similar lamps costing triple the price. It was substantially wrapped to prevent any damage and arrived in perfect condition We opened the wrapping, put in the proper bulb (also available from Amazon), plugged it in and, voila! It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bob and Jean

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lamp! Pairs well with a specialty LED bulb (or a flat one) as opposed to standard bulb designs, but it's a classic desk lamp that is different enough from the traditional green bankers lamp while still retaining the same feel. One of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Let There Be (Fancy) Light!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to put on our piano so that our kids would have more light for reading music. We don't have a really fancy piano, but this lamp relly suits its color (and apparent age!). The chain-pull is smooth and easy and my kids haven't had any issues with the lamp wanting to tip forward when the pull the chain. It's a really nice accent to our front room and performs its job wonderfully. I can't think of a single complaint.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boulware

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small desk lamp for my home office. After reading the negative reviews on the lamp, I was very hesitant to buy it. I am so happy I did. It looks great on my desk, is plenty bright with a 60 watt bulb, (I may even go down to a 40 watt), and is certainly sturdy. There is no way it should tip over when you turn it on unless you suddenly became the Hulk. Yes, the colored shade is a hard plastic, and there is a small gap at the top that you see if you are really looking for flaws, but all in all a great lamp for the price. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HKNadeau13

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Like anything in this price range it's mass manufactured out of high grade plastic, steel and paper. If you want hand made, you're in the wrong price range. That being said, it's a beautiful piece for the price and well worth it. It looks old world and feels solid. Better than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Sticky Star

customer_reviews.title: Great decorative lamp for the price not for practical use
customer_reviews.text: Lamp only has about a 2 foot cord so it is not very practical. It is very dim and cannot be used as an actual desk lamp. Looks great for the price though and adds nice warm ambient light to the room. Be careful when opening this as the lamp is packaged in Styrofoam that will crumble into confetti and get everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LIGHT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband as a gift a few years ago and he still loves it today. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Aikens

customer_reviews.title: QC on the two I bought was spot on.
customer_reviews.text: A few reviews I read on this item stated the quality control wasn't very good. I decided to order one to see (I really liked the design) and it was fine. I ordered a 2nd and it too was perfect. Great light at a great price. If you get a dud (and it does happen) just exchange it and the replacement should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: TyCo

customer_reviews.title: It should say cheap looking plastic that is supposed to look like Mica. For anyone who knows what Mica is ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I double checked after receiving the lamp. The description says "beautiful mica shade" . It should say cheap looking plastic that is supposed to look like Mica. For anyone who knows what Mica is they will be greatly disappointed. The rest of the lamp appears to be nicely constructed.
customer_reviews.author: steve p

customer_reviews.title: Really like the style and
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Really like the style and, for the price, a nice little lamp. Shopping for bulb and did not find any 60 watt bulbs but many forty watt which offer seem to offer as much light as I need. Easily found. Bought the 40 watt at local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: You are not a complete banker without this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Everybody knows that all bankers need this lamp. However, I did not got it for those purposes. It sits beautifully on my desk...
customer_reviews.author: Ines Camelia

customer_reviews.title: I love the lamp but was disappointed when it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the lamp but was disappointed when it did not come with the light bulb. Now, living in a rural area, I have to travel close to 100 miles to get a light bulb. Suggesting you note that light bulb is not included. Maybe you did but if so I missed it.
customer_reviews.author: Biz Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful on my piano!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, nicely balanced. It requires a special 60 watt "T" type bulb, so go to the hardware store when you place your order so you can set this up immediately when it arrives. I love it -- loves beautiful on our piano.
customer_reviews.author: Bevy McM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine lamp for the money, but probably worth investing in something not plastic. The plastic in mine melted with the original light bulb. I'm replacing the plastic, and putting in a lower watt to see how that works, but in the future I'll just buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and lights up the space
customer_reviews.text: Im not the pianist in the house, but when watching them, I noticed that it was a little dark for reading. I thought this looked good, and upon arrival, the rest of the observers agree. With a standard base florescent bulb this is doing a good job illuminating the pages so that our little ones can focus on improving their sight reading.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, but less than perfect workmanship
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive lamp. The dome extends out further from the base than some other banker's lamps. The chain has a smooth and easy pull. The lamp does not tip over when pulling the chain. The workmanship on the dome shade was a little sloppy - some glue and paint streaks that are more noticable when look closely. Good source of light.
customer_reviews.author: David V.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is for sure not worth the money. Very cheap and crooked as everyone has stated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light. Well made and works great on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Micky Mac

customer_reviews.title: beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful lamp. When i got it, the cover/shade was not inserted properly. You have to be careful with the shade because it feels like it's a bit on the brittle side. But other than that, i love it. It complements my home office rather nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M

customer_reviews.title: Classic and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Gives off a great warm light. Perfect for late nights in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Steward Property

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I bought it for my office to keep the room warm (the A/C is too cold) and it provides subtle lighting to improve my mood. This lamp has a sturdy base and high quality metal construction. I highly recommend this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J Martoccia

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: For a $40 lamp, this was a very good buy. It's an attractive lamp, and it is a perfect size for a desk or reading area. I bought mine more than a month ago, and have been using it on my desk. Now we're buying another for our living room area. It has the look and feel of a much more expensive lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth F. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Into the garbage it goes
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made and impossible to unpack without destroying the box. One of the shade supports snapped off as I was attempting to unpack the lamp from within the mountains of Styrofoam in which it was packed. Not even worth my time to return it. Into the garbage it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: shade is beautifull...
customer_reviews.text: I got this lamp two years for my secretary desk. The shade is beautiful as the picture. I'm very please with it light stays long with any bolb zise...
customer_reviews.author: Matilda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Normande Lighting BL1-103 60-Watt Banker's Lamp With Mica Shade
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive desk lamp. I wanted something that was different than the traditional green lamp shade. This fit the bill. Great looking lamp. Seems everything I need I can find on AMAZON.COM. Good Lamp... Much nicer looking when lit than the green shaded lamps in my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: MRH

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, inexpensive lamp but not exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I've pretty much just taken it out the box and set it up. It really is nice. Has a good weight to it. I looked it over and it seems like a solid construction. Nothing damaged or off about it. But the pictures online and on the box really makes the lampshade look red when it's really more of a light amber. Honestly I was slightly disappointed by that, but it still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: John Neal

customer_reviews.title: Classy desk lamp!
customer_reviews.text: The desk lamp is better than I thought it would be. It is sturdy (solid - quality!), perfect size for a desktop lamp, and the combination of the dark stand and mosaic-like orangy-amber cover makes this accent piece a top-notch addition to the allure to the entire room. It stands out - I LOVE it, and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Wenker Top Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice weight to it and feels like a quality fixture. Can't beat the look or the price.
customer_reviews.author: Don Martin

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this item. The white reflective surface inside of the mica shade melts and turns black. Both unsightly and dangerous. I used the Satco S3899 bulb which Amazon recommends on the same page as this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Davidinvail

customer_reviews.title: Great, adjustable banker's lamp with lovely red/gold glow
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a handsome addition to the room. Great, adjustable banker's lamp with lovely red/gold glow. Got a small computer desk. This lamp is perfect...to dress it up a bit. Seems well made. Great price. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Geoffrey Alnutt

product_meta.title: Normande Lighting BL1-103 60-Watt Banker's Lamp with Plastic Shade, 14" x 12" x 10.5", Dark Coffee
product_meta.description:
Style:ClassicClassic bankers lamp has a dark coffee painted finish with a mica shade. Lamp uses a 60W type T bulb (not included). Measures 14" in height and has a pull chain on/off switch.

AMAZON.COM


Great for your office or a kitchen nook, this classic bankers lamp from Normande Lighting (BL1-103) has a dark coffee painted finish with a mica shade. It accepts a maximum 60-watt T-type bulb (not included), and it has a pull chain on/off switch. The lamp measures 14 x 12 x 10-1/2 inches (HxWxL).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars546 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
